title: [BUG] [iOS] SKCanvasView Touch Events interrupted by Xamarin.Forms Pan & Pinch Gestures
body:
**Description**

When adding touch events to an SKCanvasView that is contained within a Xamarin.Forms container that has pan an/or pinch gesture recognizers, iOS does not handle them correctly.

**Code**

[Sample application](https://github.com/codemode18/SkiaSharpPanPinchBugRepro) that reproduces the issue

**Expected Behavior**

The sample code provided is a finger paint sample app, expected behavior is to show the path of the finger(s) as they are dragged across the screen

**Actual Behavior**

On iOS only, after a few pixels, the line stops drawing. If a Pan Gesture Recognizer is attached to the container, single finger drawing is incorrect. If a Pinch Gesture is attached, 2-finger drawing is incorrect. If both types of gesture recognizers are attached, both single and multi finger drawing are incorrect.
